article_title: Max Lucado Releases First Book On Fatherhood Just In Time For Father’s Day
article_text:
Active RNS subscribers and members can view this content by logging-in here.

(Nashville, Tenn.) – Max Lucado is a storyteller, preacher and author – he’s also a father. Max released Dad Time May 6th – his first book on fatherhood since he began writing some thirty years ago. Max writes: “I’m not a hero. I’m not a superstar. I’m not unusual. I’m a parent.” Dad Time perfectly […]
